Message.En: The Old Witch of the Woods

<COL ffdc78>(Enemy appears at night)</COL>
Defeat the enemies encountered
Message.Jp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
遭遇した敵を討伐する

Message.En:
It seems that there is someone seeking assistance 
for issues occurring at night in the <NAME AREA>.
Message.Jp:
夜間、<NAME AREA>で発生する問題に対し
助力を求める人物がいるようだ

Message.En:
<COL ffdc78>【Enemy appears during：Night】</COL>
I was really taken aback back then. 
What do you mean by "what"? 
In those deep, desolate woods, every night I heard
the voice of a captivating woman. 
What!? 
You think it's the sound of monkeys or monsters?
Do I seem that drunk to you!?
Message.Jp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
ほんとあの時はたまげたね、何がだって！？
あんな奥深い森の廃墟で、夜な夜な艶やかな
女の声が聞こえてくるんだから
え！？猿か魔物の声だろうって
僕がそんなに酔っぱらって見えるのかい！？
遭遇した敵を討伐する
